title: 15th R.K.Cho Economics Prize
text:
Greetings, Professor Susan Athey!
It is truly a pleasure to welcome you to Korea. The entire school of Yonsei University has been eagerly awaiting your visit for several months, and we are sincerely delighted to meet you through the 15th R.K. Cho Economics Award ceremony. We have organized the necessary documents and useful information that you may need during your stay in Seoul on this website. I hope you find it helpful and have a wonderful time during your stay.

text:

Application for Remittance
